title: Neptune Emerging Markets
body:
## The task

Create a distinctive advertising campaign for the Neptune Emerging Markets Fund and the Neptune Global Alpha Fund to raise awareness and generate inflows.

The solution

We created an online campaign for the Neptune Emerging Markets Fund and both print and online advertising for the Neptune Global Alpha Fund which have distinctive look and feel to create cut-through.

The results

The Neptune Global Emerging Markets Fund campaign has achieved higher than average CTRs.
